info.name: RentGrid WhatsApp-like Chat System APIs
info.description:
Complete collection of chat, message, and user presence APIs for WhatsApp-like functionality with real-time Socket.IO integration.

## Real-Time Features:
- **Auto Message Delivery**: Messages are automatically delivered to all participants via Socket.IO
- **Room Management**: Users automatically join chat rooms and receive real-time updates
- **Typing Indicators**: See when users are typing in real-time
- **Online/Offline Status**: Track user presence across chats
- **Message Acknowledgments**: Confirm message delivery to connected clients

## Socket.IO Events:
- `newMessage`: Real-time message delivery with full sender details
- `user-typing` / `user-stop-typing`: Typing indicators
- `user-joined-chat` / `user-left-chat`: Chat presence
- `user-status-change`: Online/offline status
- `message-read-by`: Read receipts

## Authentication:
Include JWT token in Socket.IO auth: `{ auth: { token: 'your-jwt-token' } }`

variable.description: Valid ObjectId of target user (Tenant or Owner)

item.name: Contacts
item.description: Contact APIs for managing WhatsApp-like contact list with chat information

request.description: Get all possible chat partners with WhatsApp-like sorting. Returns contacts sorted by latest chat activity (most recent first), with contacts having existing chats at the top. Includes full URLs for profile photos and media files.

item.name: Messages
item.description: Message APIs for sending, receiving, and managing messages

request.description: Get all messages for a specific chat. Returns all messages with enhanced sender details (including user type, phone number) and full URLs for all media files. Messages are sorted by creation time (oldest first).
